Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: J. Dimick
Reviews.Content: I got this camera this past weekend, and I love it.  The pics are crisp, the design is sleek, and it's fun to shoot with.  I'm excited to give the underwater function a try (with the appropriate kit, of course), and the settings are really useful for a variety of scenes.  The only downside is that I had to buy a Memory Stick, which was a little difficult to find.  Also, it was a bit expensive (25$ for 2G).  However, this price included a memory card adapter, so I didn't have to buy a new card reader for my computer.  All in all, I think this is a great camera!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: A. DiVencenzo
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my girlfriend to replace an aging camera.  The camera is very easy to use.  A true point and shoot dummy camera.  It takes great photos in all different conditions such as full sun, indoors, dusk, night and so forth.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: L. Mitchell "Mom of 6"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. I have a macbook and this camera was plug and play...no additional software needed. It takes great pics and video that I don't have to edit for my website. Love the color too. I am not a digital camera freak. I'm pretty easy, but it is easy to use, light weight, and sturdy. Works for me. :)

Reviews.Title: Cybershot DSC-W220 12MP
Reviews.Author: Anna L. Van Stock
Reviews.Content: Great camera. Pictures turned out great. Love the pink color! Zoom capabilities & pictures are better than my old Canon. Don't like the zoom button placement & Power ON/OFF button. The zoom should be on the front of the camera. Much easier on my Canon to zoom. The Power button is tiny! I have to use the edge of my nail to turn the camera on/off. Other than that...great camera, at a great price.

Reviews.Title: Battery life it terrible!
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: This camera has the worst battery life I have ever experienced. I have had many Sony digital cameras. I have to charge this camera or at the very least check the charge level before every use. I am also very sad Sony has moved away from showing remaining battery life in minutes, now we just get the bars and you never know how long the last bar is going to last. Especially when it gets to that last bar in a matter of hours.I wanted to return this camera but my daughter loves it. (I have to make sure it's always charged though.)On another note. Sony has also moved away from in camera charging. You now have to remove the battery and charge it in it's own little charge cradle. Again this is a major hassle. Yes my Nikon & Canon slr's have the same function of charging but their batteries last for months before a charge is required. To me this is just an obvious plot by Sony to make you purchase a spare battery, for a leisure camera and with todays technology this should never be the case. I still own a Sony DSC-P200. A fantastic camera whose battery life always surprises me as being almost eternal. I've taken that camera on a 2 week vacation, shot 100's of pictures and never had to think about the battery. This just shows how Sony have changed and I'm sad to say I think this may very well be my last Sony camera.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: J. Dahlberg
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice camera for the price.  It lets you record up to 25 min. of video.  Picture quality is excellent.  I love the fact that the battery is re-chargeable.  I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this camera in September 2009.  It no longer works.  Through normal use, this camera has "corrosion" damage.  The bill to fix?  $250.  It's more than the camera cost.  Sony customer service has been the pits through all of this too.  Nobody cares about fixing the problem.  We have several cameras that are 2 - 3 years old and they still work (and certainly they have been used in FAR harsher conditions than this one.  We are done purchasing Sony products.  Think twice about it.  They can come up with a pretty simple reason why your product does not fall under warranty....PATHETIC.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Adriana Hernandez "AdrienneAurora"
Reviews.Content: I live in Venezuela, and I received the camera 2 days ago... It's great! Im loving it! It's easy to use, the smile shutter works better than I spected, the macro shoot function works very nicely... And the high sensibility ISO 3200 improves a lot the shoots in certain places.I also tried plugging it to the TV and making a slideshow with music and visual effects!Im very pleased with the camera and the price is more than just for all the great functions of it.It will be a great tool for my blog and my futures vacations. I totally recomend it.

Reviews.Title: Internal parts exploded from corrosion
Reviews.Author: Tristan Schmelcher
Reviews.Content: This was an okay camera until it broke due to exploding internal parts! I bought it in fall of last year for a trip to Sweden and it was okay. Then this year we took it to Japan. We went on a hike and tried to take a picture of a shrine and heard a very loud "pop" sound from the camera. After that the flash never worked again. I called Sony customer support and they instructed me to reset its settings to the factory defaults and try to take a picture with flash, which caused the pop sound again and completely killed the camera for good! Sent it to their warranty repair shop and they later called me to say that it broke because of corrosion which wasn't covered under the warranty and they wouldn't repair it, even though THEIR phone representative's instructions were what broke it for good! I guess Sony doesn't design their cameras to work in the humid hiking trails of their own country. Needless to say, I will never buy a Sony camera again.

Reviews.Title: Sending back
Reviews.Author: Shari Berry "JustShari"
Reviews.Content: Camera will not turn on.  It is beat up, scratched up, dropped, color peeled off,  very poor condition.  It will not turn on, and did not include charger to check to see if the battery is bad.  I can't pay more money for a new battery just "in case" it works.  I sent the camera back for a refund this morning.  Highly disappointed.  The description was good/used.

Reviews.Title: absolutely wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: victoria
Reviews.Content: This camera has been the best electronics purchase I made all year. It is easy to use, has good picture quality and has had absolutely no problems.  It's also small enough to carry everywhere but still has a big enough screen/buttons to be able to use easily.  I've had it over a year and I just couldn't love it more.  A great buy, I highly recommend it!!

Reviews.Title: well worth the money
Reviews.Author: Steve Aho
Reviews.Content: very nice camera takes great pictures has many features. the only bad thing is the battery have to be taken out to recharge it. my other sony cybershot has a cradle to put camera in to recharge much easier

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great color!!!
Reviews.Author: jellifer
Reviews.Content: I really love this camera.  We've had a Sony Handycam (mini DVD & dig camera combo) for years, but I wanted a small camera that I could easily fit into my purse (since having downsized from diaper bags - yay!!).  This camera is a perfect size and takes great pictures.  My 7 year old also loves using it.  She wants one of her own - she'll have to wait a while!  The pink color is pretty, bright and makes it easy to spot in a dark purse. It's very easy to use, the touch screen is wonderful and the removable rechargable batteries are great.  The charger is also very small and very fast.  I don't think that anybody could or should have any dislikes or problems.

Reviews.Title: Super Cute!!
Reviews.Author: Monica
Reviews.Content: I just recieved my Pink Sony Cybershot 12MP in the mail...this is one GREAT camera...picture are very clear and best of all, its user friendly...it pretty much does everything for you, but it also has a lot of features, which I  still need to read the Manuel for.  Overall, its a great deal for the price...I have recommended this camera to many people!!

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: J. G. Oxborrow "SoundClown"
Reviews.Content: This is the second DSC-W220 that I have purchased recently. I got  this one for my wife for Mother's Day. Now when we go on trips we will both have compatible cameras to photograph our two different  view points. Pretty cool. You can't beat the price for such a good little digital camera. It wasn't that long ago that a camera at this price didn't have a rechargeable battery, let alone 12 megapixel. It rocks!

Reviews.Title: Totally Pleased With Purchase
Reviews.Author: cherokeecat
Reviews.Content: My son is more knowledgeable about cameras and said this is the one I needed.  I read other's reviews and decided to go for it.  Rec'd camera in great cond.  Easy to use and I am very pleased with the quality.  This is one of the best cameras I've ever owned (and I love the pink)!  I was a little disappointed that it takes a different size memory stick than what I already have, but not a big deal.  LOVE the image stablization feature.  Most of my pictures were blurry before, but not anymore!  Totally love that!  Also love the other features of ways to take pics - like night, snow, etc.  Also, like the battery charger, just plugs in the wall - no cords.  Thought the dial to switch between features might be hard to use, but really isn't.  Not real good on the smile feature, I may just need more time, but it does seem easier to just take your own pic rather than having to wait on smile detection.  Haven't had camera very long, but love it!

Reviews.Title: Buying at AMAZON
Reviews.Author: CHER
Reviews.Content: He i bought this product and got it very fast, the shipping is real fast.Thank you Amazon for helping others in buying productsThe sony cybershot has a very good picture quality, i like it very much.It has a 4x optical zoom, thats cool.I would recommend this product to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: T. Krutz
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera and I would recommend it for anyone.  Get camera to keep in your purse for those special moments.  Great price too.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Anastasia Akhtyamova "Nastusha1984"
Reviews.Content: I was going to get a Canon camera at first since it's a well-known and respected brand but decided to give Sony another try (I own a Sony camera which I like but wanted more megapixels to work with). Let me tell you this camera is well worth the price, it has a lot of nice features to it, all the pics are really clear and in bright vivid colors, tried different settings and they all seem to work just fine producing fine quality photos. I actually compared the quality of the pics to my friend's taken with Canon camera (the one I wanted)on the same occasion - mine came out way better!!!!!!! My advice is not to overpay for the name, there are nice quality products out there that will not empty your wallet completely!

Reviews.Title: Pretty in Pink
Reviews.Author: Stephen Richardson "Stephen Richardson"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife and it has been a good camera. The smile capture feature actually works.12MP for $150 - You can't go wrong!

Reviews.Title: super little camera
Reviews.Author: Unknown
Reviews.Content: Awesome little camera. Nice clear pictures, easy to handle. Only setback is the battery doesn't last long. All in all very happy with it.skylark.lee4

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: Carolina Rosales G
Reviews.Content: this camera is perfect for everyday photo, is light and have a good size screen, lovely outdoor pics, and color is just a plus ;>

Reviews.Title: You can buy a better one now
Reviews.Author: Andres Meseguer Rojas "Meseguer"
Reviews.Content: Probably you can a get a better camera now, but in 2019 when i got it was pretty good for the price

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: M. Heilbrun
Reviews.Content: This sony camera is nice. the 12mp takes crisp pictures. The video option also takes impressive video. The camera is very solid and really compact.

Reviews.Title: Excellant pocket camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: This is a great pocket camera that I purchased a year ago for my 13 year old daughter. She found it to be easy to use and loves the quality of photos that it takes. Easy to download photos to her laptop she just purchased using her own money from babysitting. Would buy another one if lost or stolen.

Reviews.Title: My lovely camera
Reviews.Author: MONICA
Reviews.Content: I love the photos... so this item is perfect for me.  Very easy to use, the color is great...I'm very happy with this purchase

Reviews.Title: Cheap, great quarlity
Reviews.Author: h.m
Reviews.Content: Sony has published a lot of new products.This type is kind of old, but I love it.It takes good pictures.I just wanted to take pictures.This one is good enough for me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Mark Twain
Reviews.Content: Nice solid feeling camera, has many photo options.  I have not quite mastered it yet but it has great potential.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Shopping Fan
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera, i actually got one stolen and bought another one, the exact same one. i wouldn't trade it for anything. there is a newer model out now though. i bought this one at 215$ last year and bought the exact same one but a newer model in red for my mom for christmas, i got that one off of ebay for $160. but it takes great pictures, Carl Ziess lens are the best you can ask for, the only complaint i have is the zoom. it hardly zooms in at all. other than that i really like it, great quality, great design, everything.

Reviews.Title: Great Point and Shoot Camera for a GREAT Price
Reviews.Author: Tennille Burton "a_fortunefaded"
Reviews.Content: My first digital camera was one I bought in 2005 on Ebay, without any knowledge whatsoever of digital cameras.  It was an HP Photosmart with 6MP (which was great at the time) and I loved it.  However, as technology progresses so rapidly, my "new" camera was out of date within a year.I waited and looked for a very long time before selecting the Sony Cybershot.  I have always bought other Sony electronics, but was having a difficult time deciding between Nikon, Canon, or Sony for my new camera.  I finally picked this camera for several reasons:- Ease of use- 12MP (one of the best quality cameras on the market)- No batteries required- LOVE the smile-recognition mode, which will only take a picture once a smile is detected.- Excellent priceThe only downsides for the camera that I would have to report are:- It doesn't take a regular memory card, instead it takes an SD card, which is slightly more expensive.- Without a converter, it's impossible to get pictures from the SD card off the camera and onto my laptop (unless you own a Sony VAIO laptop, where there will be an SD-compatible slot for the card).- Sometimes has troubles focusing close up (also may depend on which camera mode is being used).Overall, it's a great camera for an exceptional price, it is sturdy, and it going to last a long time since it's a Sony.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot: A pint sized dynamo
Reviews.Author: June E. Porter "J.E. Porter Book Maven"
Reviews.Content: viewed spectacular panoramic & colorful photos of scenes taken in Dakar,Senegal and Mauritania by a friend during a trip we both took in 2008. The photos looked like they were taken by a professional photographer using a more expensive camera. When I was told the pixs were taken using the Sony Cybershot DSC W 220. I was blown away! I couldn't wait to own one. Its a lightweight  portable camera and I also love the choice of camera colors...I purchased the Pink one! I'm crusing to the Bahams soon and can't wait to take photographs of the Caribbean landscape.

Reviews.Title: Great value camera
Reviews.Author: William S. Moore
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a Christmas present for my daughter; she hasn't used it much yet but seems very pleased with it so far. It's a very solid camera for the price--easy to use, large view screen, fairly intuitive interface; I have an older Cybershot model myself and have been very satisfied with the picture quality, so I assume that will be the same for this one.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: H. Peters
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony camera before and got another since I liked my first so much!  It is east to use, and the quality of the photos and video is great!

Reviews.Title: A Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Dave Hartigan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girlfriend Amy and she just loved it. Now she has gone but the camera is still doing really well. I takes really nice pics..

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Mommy to The Princess
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this camera.  This is my 2nd Sony Cyber Shot and I don't think that I will ever buy a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: A. Tamayo "A-ette"
Reviews.Content: I like it so much! I'm very pleased with my purchase. I love the color (I have it in pink) and is super sleek, it can be easily carried in a pocket.The quality of the pictures is excellent and it has lots of features.

Reviews.Title: lovin the camera
Reviews.Author: Altagracia Minyety
Reviews.Content: I just got the camera today and I am already loving it.It is cute and takes good pics I can fit it in my pocket too I recomend this camera too every one out there.

Reviews.Title: Karens first digital camera
Reviews.Author: Karen A. Wadley
Reviews.Content: Good for trip to New York I am the last person in USA to get a digital camera

Reviews.Title: they left something out.
Reviews.Author: Patrick Stakem
Reviews.Content: Ships without a memory card. This is not acceptable.I had ordered one, via Amazon, from another vendor,but it did not show up in time. So, we have a very hightech brick, incapable of taking pictures on Christmas.The small cost of including even a minimal memory cardwould vastly outweigh the inconvenience.

Reviews.Title: complicated camera
Reviews.Author: Phil LeFebvre "MiXTC"
Reviews.Content: very complicated camera set up.  Unable to delete saved pictures.  Returned as quick as possible

Reviews.Title: I love Sony Cameras!!!
Reviews.Author: jamee "Jamee"
Reviews.Content: i have a blue camera liks this and its a 7.2 MP and they say the more MP the more there better so i thought i would order this one and i did and i should be getting it tuesday just in time to take new Picts of my Neice.And i love this Color pink!!!! And i needed a new one cause mine is all scatched and dented so my mom will get that one and ill get this one!!!

Reviews.Title: OMG AWESOME xoxo
Reviews.Author: Claire
Reviews.Content: i just got my pink sony dsc-w220 this afternoon, omg it's soooo cute! i love it! and fast shipping too!!!! sony is the best! <3
